org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl
Class LTLTemporalHierarchy

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.LTLTemporalHierarchy

public class LTLTemporalHierarchy
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods for checking syntactically if an LTL formula is a standard κ-formula based on [Edward Y. Chang, Zohar Manna, Amir Pnueli: Characterization of Temporal Property Classes. ICALP 1992: 474-486] where κ is safety, guarantee, obligation, recurrence, persistence, or reactivity. A κ-formula specifies a $kappa;-property. A property is specifiable by temporal logics is a κ-property if and only if it is specifiable by a future standard κ-formula.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

classify

public static java.util.Collection<TemporalHierarchy> classify(LTL formula)
Returns a collection of classes of the Temporal Hierarchy such that a class κ is in the returned collection if and only if a specified LTL formula is a standard κ-formula.

Parameters:
formula - an LTL formula
Returns:
classes of the Temporal Hierarchy, which contains a class κ if and only if the specified LTL formula is a standard κ-formula
